lufs_info.title: What is LUFS?
lufs_info.text:
ğŸšï¸ What is LUFS?
LUFS (Loudness Units Full Scale) measures how loud we actually perceive audio.
The lower the number (more negative), the softer it sounds.

ğŸ“ Common examples:
  ğŸ¬  âˆ’23 LUFS   Very low (European TV)
  ğŸ™ï¸  âˆ’18 LUFS   Moderate
  ğŸ§  âˆ’16 LUFS   Recommended for music and podcasts
  ğŸµ  âˆ’14 LUFS   Loud, good for Spotify or YouTube
  ğŸ”Š  âˆ’12 LUFS   Very loud
  ğŸš¨  âˆ’10 LUFS   Risk of distortion

ğŸ’¡ Recommendations:
âœ” Use âˆ’16 LUFS for natural, balanced sound.
âœ” Use âˆ’14 LUFS for streaming platforms.
âœ˜ Avoid values above âˆ’10 LUFS â€” may sound distorted.
